title: Community Development Investment Review: Green Edition – Volume 10, Issue 1, 2014
summary: This special edition of the Community Development Investment Review is dedicated to exploring energy efficiency issues and solutions through a community development lens. The journal highlights several innovative and interdisciplinary efforts that are addressing both community development and environmental concerns – from air quality to climate change to education and asset building.
tag-1: Community Development Investment Review: Green Edition – Volume 10, Issue 1, 2014
